documents.document: Somewhat re-post but... been having the absolute best time back in Nashville. Thanks to everyone who made this my favourite AmericanaFest yet. Time to lay low for a few weeks but I can’t remember the last time I was this excited for the future. #NewBeginnings https://t.co/a2XtkufBlg

@NathalieSLarsen @TonderFestival Me: Ireland?

@Jack5326 Haha
@lindseymgrimes Not here geographically lol, but I’ll be in Nash a lot
@Jack5326 How bout you...
No time like lying on the grass on a warm September night in Nashville to send an email to quit your day job. And I’ve done just that. New life starts here 🌇🎆
@kalieshorr great to meet you at the weekend. Looking forward to to catching a show in either Nashville or London soon!
